**Output:**

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true

data <- mtcars
model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = data)
cat("Coefficients:\n")
print(round(coef(model), 3))
cat("\nR-squared:", 
    round(summary(model)$r.squared, 3))
```
